title: Abandoned (restored, with intro and outro commentary) (1949, film noir, imdb score: 6.7)

sources.title: Abandoned 1949 Restored Movie 720p
sources.description: Abandoned is a 1949 American crime film noir starring Dennis O'Keefe , Gale Storm and Jeff Chandler . Directed by Joseph M. Newman , it is also known as Abandoned Women and Not Wanted .
